description:
En consults his comrade Turkey, whose magical dolls may identify the "lizard guy." Caiman and Nikaido visit Kasukabe, a professor studying sorcerers.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Kamo no Roast Mahou Tsukai Soe / Butoukai e wa Seisou de Okoshi Kudasaimase / Yuku Toshi Kuru Toshi in "Hall"
Roast Duck a La Sorcerer / Formal Attire Requested / Another Year in the Hole
鴨のロースト魔法使い添え / 舞踏会へは正装でおこしくださいませ / ゆく年くる年in "ホール"
